Description: Dark-blue glazed composition finger-ring, the circular hoop is in the form of a composite lotus/papyrus stem and supports an aegis of Hathor or Mut wearing the double-crown. The counterpoise forms part of the shank.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): fig.45
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
